thread.title: Feeling Happy and Safe in the Middle of NYC
thread.title_full: Feeling Happy and Safe in the Middle of NYC - Review of BEST WESTERN PREMIER Herald Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: gennyl933
title: Feeling Happy and Safe in the Middle of NYC
text: This hotel and its' staff made us feel like family from the minute we walked in. We travel a lot but never stayed overnight in NYC and didn't know what to expect but my goodness, this hotel not only has a great location, is very clean but the staff all made us feel like "family". I have already recommended it to many of my friends and family.
